name: Harbor City
role_in_state: Primary maritime hub and shipbuilding center
culture_adjustments: Guild-dominated apprenticeship system with dockside rites
Denser patronage networks and broker-centric dispute resolution
More frequent rope-and-net ritual festivals tied to shipping seasons
Multilingual dockspeech blending Coastal Tongues and Riveric loanwords
Practical legal charters tailored to vessel contracts over kin-law
constraints: Ritual auguries consume scarce imported reagents limiting frequency
Harbor expansion constrained by shoals and engineered breakwaters
No institutional long-range mind-influence or resurrection magics enforced
notes: Strategic economic linchpin of State_9; patronage determines access to yards
Localized ritual magic supports navigation and preservation but raises reagent supply vulnerability
Near-medieval to early-industrial tech with limited combustion industry
